summary:
o	Have 13+ years of experience in Quality Assurance Engineering with the knowledge in Payment systems and Test Automation frameworks
o	Have knowledge of various Software testing methodologies like Simply@scale, DevOps, Agile, Waterfall, Iterative and V-Model
o	Have reasonable exposure to software test automation in selenium, cucumber, fitnesse for the web and CLOUD based applications
o	Have wider knowledge and experience of E2E chain tests in web and mobile based applications 
o	Experience in Rest assured for the API test automation and wiremock to mock test data for the API calls. Have experience in testing API’s with POSTMAN and SOAPUI as well. 
o	Experience in designing and developing of Automation test framework using Selenium with Java 
o	Extensive working knowledge of HP Quality center, JIRA, Confluence, GIT, SPLUNK and PCF
o	Experience in testing cloud based applications and API’s. Experience in CI/CD pipelines
o	Have good knowledge in SOA testing and excel Macros. Good at VB and Java scripting 
o	As part of T-shaping, started fixing Java and HTML minor bug fixes 
o	Handled production incidents as part of ‘Man of the day’ role
o	Effective coordination and interaction with client stakeholders, onshore and offshore teams

Skill set:

Testing tools	                   : Selenium, Fitnesse, Cucumber, Rest Assured, QTP, QC, Jenkins, Maven, SOAP 
                                                 UI, POSTMAN, Eclipse and IntelliJ IDE.
Type of Testing	           : Automation Testing, Exploratory Testing, System Testing, SIT, UAT, 
                                                 Regression Testing, Mobile and Cross Browser Testing, E2E Testing
Test Management tools	   : Jira, Confluence, Git
Certification	                   : ISTQB certified test Professional, Certified Scrum Master
Domain Expertise	           : Banking – Payment flows, Transaction channels
Language Skills	           : Java, VB Script, JavaScript, SQL

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for AWS integration test automation
- Mobile test automation
- API test automation using Cucumber, Jest and Chakram
- Programming language Java and Typescript
profile_positions.title: Sr. Automation Tester

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:

•	Creating and maintaining automation frontend tests  using selenium and java with the wiremock stubdata for the cloud based web applications
•	Creating and maintaining automation API Tests using rest assured and cucumber with the wiremock stub data for the CLOUD based API’s
•	API Deployments to cloud
•	API test automation which runs in local and in PCF
•	Mobile testing
•	Update and maintain the automation test scripts based on new features
•	Run all the automation tests, whenever there is a new feature added and troubleshoot the failures
•	Test execution through manual and automation
•	Defect tracking and closure verifications
•	As part of T-shaping, started fixing Java and HTML minor bug fixes 
•	Chain deployments
•	E2E Chain tests in web applications and mobile apps
•	Log verifications 
•	CI/CD 
•	Pipeline test failure verification and fixes
•	Poker the user stories in refinement
•	Sprint Demo to Product owners
•	Focus on team improvement and discuss in Retrospective meetings
•	Part of Sprint planning
•	Test scenarios and test case creation
•	Test data preparation through stubs

profile_positions.title: Test Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:

Detailed Analysis of functional requirements.
- Test scenarios and test case creation.
- Test case review and test execution.
- Updating test cases based on change request.
- Defect tracking and closure verifications.
- Preparing requirement traceability matrix to ensure the test coverage.
- Test environmental setup based on test cases.
- Test scripts creation for automation.
- Test execution through automation.
- Status report and tracking.
- Involved in Sharing information about the key concepts about automation scripts and installation within the team by writing Knowledge based documents and floating it in the intranet.
- Modifying key documents as and when required in order to propagate the knowledge to the new joiners without much effort.
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:-

- Preparing effort estimation.
- Responsible for understanding the functional requirement & preparing documents.
- In-charge for preparing & executing test plans.
- Preparing RTM (Requirement Traceability Matrix) to ensure the testing coverage.
- Was involved in defect discussion meeting at the end of the day with developers and client managers.
- Involved in Sharing information about the key concepts in our project within the team by writing Knowledge based documents and floating it in the intranet.
- Modifying key documents as and when required in order to propagate the knowledge to the new joiners without much effort.
- Performing functional testing, E2E testing, SOA testing, Regression Testing through QTP.
- Production support.
- Handling BTR (Balance Transaction Service) module.
profile_positions.title: Test Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:- 

- Analysis of business and functional requirements.
- Test environment and data setup.
- Test case preparation.
- Updating test cases based on change request.
- Test execution and defect tracking process.
- Coordination with client.
- Communication with Application Team.
profile_positions.title: Jr. Testing Engineer
